content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
IF OBJECT_ID('silver_taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
 GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
WITH
( 
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
) AS
SELECT  * FROM  bronze.taxi_zone;

-- select data from silver.taxi_zone external table
SELECT  * FROM  silver.taxi_zone;

select DISTINCT(borough) from silver.taxi_zone
